title: Pondicherry French Quarter Villa
description: Charming colonial-era villa in Pondicherry's White Town. Featuring French architectural elements, high ceilings, and a private courtyard. Just a short walk from Promenade Beach and local cafes.

title: Ooty Tea Estate Bungalow
description: Historic planter's bungalow nestled in a private tea estate near Ooty. Enjoy cool mountain air, panoramic Nilgiri views, and colonial charm in this meticulously maintained property with original period features.

title: Thiruvananthapuram Heritage Home
description: Traditional Kerala-style nalukettu home near Padmanabhaswamy Temple. Featuring wooden architecture, a central courtyard, and authentic Kerala design elements. Experience authentic South Indian living in this heritage property.

title: Bhaktapur Traditional House
description: Authentic Newari brick house in Bhaktapur's heritage area. Featuring intricate wood carvings, traditional courtyards, and easy access to Durbar Square. A perfect blend of history and comfort in Nepal's cultural heartland.

title: Kodaikanal Lake View Cottage
description: Charming hillside cottage with stunning views of Kodaikanal Lake. This cozy retreat features stone construction, a fireplace, and beautiful gardens. Ideal for those seeking peaceful mountain living in Tamil Nadu's princess of hill stations.

title: Patna Riverside Mansion
description: Majestic riverside mansion overlooking the Ganges in Patna. This palatial property features marble floors, grand pillars, and luxurious amenities throughout. Experience regal living in Bihar's capital city.

title: Gurgaon Luxury Penthouse
description: Ultra-modern penthouse in Gurgaon's premier high-rise with panoramic city views. Featuring smart home technology, premium finishes, and access to world-class amenities including pool, gym, and concierge services.

title: Tiruchirappalli Heritage Villa
description: Spacious heritage villa near Rockfort Temple in Trichy. This property blends traditional South Indian architecture with modern comforts, featuring high ceilings, spacious verandas, and lush gardens.

title: Pokhara Lakeview Retreat
description: Serene property overlooking Phewa Lake in Pokhara with stunning Annapurna views. This contemporary Nepali-style home features large windows to maximize mountain views and easy access to lakeside cafes and shops.

title: Coorg Coffee Plantation Home
description: Charming estate home nestled in a working coffee plantation in Coorg. Wake up to the aroma of coffee blossoms and enjoy panoramic views of the Western Ghats from this beautifully appointed property.

title: Varanasi Ghat View House
description: Unique property with direct views of the Ganges ghats in Varanasi. Experience the spiritual heart of India from this beautifully restored traditional home just steps from Dashashwamedh Ghat.

title: Rishikesh Riverside Ashram
description: Peaceful spiritual retreat on the banks of the Ganges in Rishikesh. This property features meditation spaces, yoga halls, and simple yet comfortable accommodations in a serene natural setting.

title: Munnar Tea Gardens Cottage
description: Charming cottage nestled in the rolling tea gardens of Munnar. Wake up to misty mountain views and the fresh aroma of tea in this idyllic Kerala hill station retreat.
